answers.answer: If you fail they may send you for the 3 hour test to make sure it's not a false positive like mine.
If youu have it then you'll have to take another test.
a 3 hour test and if u fail that then meet with a dietichian if you cant control with diet then you get insulin .
3 hour test, if u fail that one, expect a diet and exercise. If that doesn't work, they will give you medication. If that doesn't work, they will give you insulin.

I had mine a 3wks ago..it depends on ur results...also don't eat before u go...with me.they skipped the 3hr test and went straight to monitoring my sugars meaning i have to finger stick myself after every meal and record the #s....u have to eat less than 30 carbs/meal..I'm not on meds bcuz my nmbrs stay in a good range..it just ***** cuz ill have to do it until  baby is born...

question: Wat shud I expect if I fail. And end up having gestational diabetes.?
